info.title: Point and No click
info.author: BeReDeZeBe
info.details:
The final version of a Wii arcade/maze game.

You are the greeen square. The red square follows you. You have to guide the red square to the orange square. The red square mustn't to touch the walls.
There are 11 levels.

Controls :
A : Begin the game
IR : Move the green square
Home : Return to Homebrew Channel

Credits :
- BeReDeZeBe (Programming)
- The Mod Archive (Music)

See also :
- "Marcos Lopez: Part II"
- "YHAA!"


Changelog :

- Initial version

v0.2 - March 19, 2010 :
- 4 new levels
- New interface
- Music

v0.3 - April 16, 2010 :
- 3 new levels

v0.4 - June 09, 2010 :
- New graphics
- New interface

v0.41 Final - September 05, 2013 :
- New HBC icon
- Different meta.xml
- Optimizations
